content: the pattern includes instructions for a single-colored version in the appendix you ll find a color chart for a multicolored version the size of the finished item is approx 48 x 48 cm written pattern with photos of some parts that can be a bit tricky skill level advanced beginner - intermediate stitches used puff cluster front/back post single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet *la belle époque* was a period of western history from ca 1870 to the outbreak of world war i in 1914 it was characterized by optimism economic prosperity and technological scientific and cultural innovations my pattern is inspired by art nouveau jugendstil which emerged from this period art nouveau is characterized by nature inspired motifs and also curvilinear and geometrical forms
